main event: Observers in Newburgh, New Jersey reported seeing a red object that appeared to hover and occasionally change directions on January 10, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright red and yellow, with flashes of red., It hovered briefly and then reappeared farther south after disappearing., The sighting lasted approximately 11 minutes., The observers noted that the object moved in a manner inconsistent with conventional aircraft., The preliminary conclusion suggested the object may not have been a weather balloon.
sighted object: a red and yellow hovering object
